name: Peppa's Horror
description:
If the doors don't work, it means Peppa has locked them. If she has, press 'E' again until it works.

Click on cabinets (not the top one), bins, couches, beds, baths and sinks to search them.

Touch doors to go through them.

Note: There is the chance that you will not get all four mud jars. If you don't, retry the game.

If you find any other glitches apart from the mud jars, tell me in the comments.
